tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SustainabilityDocuments (
    document_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    document_name VARCHAR(255),
    certification_type VARCHAR(50),
    issue_date DATE,
    expiration_date DATE,
    organization VARCHAR(100),
    compliance_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE certifications (
    certification_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    certification_name VARCHAR(255),
    certification_authority VARCHAR(255),
    certification_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_documents (
    document_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    document_type VARCHAR(255),
    document_title VARCHAR(255),
    document_date DATE,
    certification_id UUID,
    CONSTRAINT fk_certification_id FOREIGN KEY (certification_id) REFERENCES certifications(certification_id)
);

CREATE TABLE certifications (
    certification_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    certification_name TEXT,
    issuing_organization TEXT,
    issue_date DATE,
    expiration_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_documents (
    document_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    document_name TEXT,
    document_type TEXT,
    document_url TEXT,
    upload_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE supply_chain_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name TEXT,
    supplier_name TEXT,
    certification_id INT,
    document_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE certifications (
    cert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    cert_name VARCHAR(50),
    cert_organization VARCHAR(100),
    cert_standard VARCHAR(50),
    cert_issue_date DATE,
    cert_expiry_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_documents (
    doc_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    doc_name VARCHAR(50),
    doc_type VARCHAR(50),
    doc_description TEXT,
    doc_upload_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE suppliers (
    supplier_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    supplier_name VARCHAR(100),
    supplier_location VARCHAR(100),
    supplier_contact_person VARCHAR(100),
    supplier_email VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE supply_chain (
    chain_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    supplier_id INT,
    cert_id INT,
    doc_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (supplier_id) REFERENCES suppliers(supplier_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (cert_id) REFERENCES certifications(cert_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (doc_id) REFERENCES compliance_documents(doc_id)
);

CREATE TABLE certifications (
    certification_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    certification_name VARCHAR(255),
    certification_body VARCHAR(255),
    issue_date DATE,
    expiration_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE suppliers (
    supplier_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    supplier_name VARCHAR(255),
    country VARCHAR(100),
    certification_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (certification_id) REFERENCES certifications(certification_id)
);
